Inglewood.Banc of California Stadium: Banc of California Stadium is a soccer-specific stadium under construction in the Exposition Park neighborhood of Los Angeles, California for Los Angeles FC, a Major League Soccer expansion team. It is the first open-air stadium built in the City of Los Angeles since 1962. Being constructed on the site of the former Los Angeles Memorial Sports Arena, it is located next to the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum and just south of the main campus of the University of Southern California.
